title: .5 Seconds of invisibility
body: Is virtually worthless. wtf is this shit?

replies.body:
.5 seconds is 500ms of ping.

That is a long time to be unable to react to something attacking you.
Nah, its hardly relevant. I mean at least put a cleanse on it, or a shield, or more speed boost. The cooldown is murder too.
is .5 seconds that short to you?
Its 1/2 of a second. Its not short to me, its just short. Irrelevantly short. A very short list of league abilities lasting 1/2 second.
.5 seconds can mean the difference between winning a teamfight and losing a teamfight. Every second matters in League.
.5 is enough to throw people off
